main.name: Janice Tsai
main.description: Interested in backend, cloud computing, network, and security
main.bio: Aside from coding and learning new ways of solving problems that make an impact, I really enjoy hiking, music, and being outdoors.

education.description: Second year. Engineering related organizations: Women in Engineering Organization at UCLA, Bruin Home Solutions. Non-technical: Co-Music Director of Road to Damascus Acapella.
Learned programming, 3D modeling/design, machining, art, physics through hands-on projects. Attended Bay Area Maker Faire 2019 to showcase senior capstone project to thousands of people.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Built a charting application that monitors the health of networks and servers, providing live statistics and visualization. Significantly reduced query and number of API calls by more than 90%. Improved workflow productivity by automating manual process of populating a dashboard. Implemented bug fixtures and added sorting by category, duplication of emails, and send notification abilities to an email builder and managing tool.

work.company: Bruin Home Solutions | The Data Grid
work.title: Backend Software Developer
work.description: Creating a centralized data management application for auditors across campus. Helping design backend architecture. Wrote query validation for database schema.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Developed and maintained a platform that helps small-medium sized businesses find manufacturers for their tangible products and manage their supply chain needs. Built pages and dashboards from UI/UX designs. Implemented customer-driven chat interface on landing page. Condensed page response times through optimization.

work.company: Assocation of Computing Machinery | Teach LA
work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Developing an interactive module for students to learn tech related topics, including how the internet works.

projects.title: The Data Grid
projects.category: A software distribution for communities to share data and resources with our platform

projects.title: Delivery System
projects.category: An optimized delivery system built in C++, using OpenStreetMap data.

projects.title: Smart Coffee Machine
projects.category: Hands free coffee machine controlled via bluetooth

testimonials.text: Janice is one of the most curious people I've ever met. She's driven by her desire to learn more.
I have really enjoyed working with Janice. She is one of the most hardworking young women I know.
